bug.author: Algomorph
bug.summary: python calls to stereoRectify result in strange error
bug.description:
Call to cv2.stereoRectify(K1,d1,K2,d2,im_size,R,T) in python raises the following error: <denchmark-code>----> 1 cv2.stereoRectify(K1,d1,K2,d2,im_size,R,T)
TypeError: function takes exactly 2 arguments (3 given)
</denchmark-code>

comments.comment: This bug is no longer present. Closing.
